scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,magenta "pnpm --filter terminal-game-backend dev" "pnpm --filter frontend dev"

scripts.start: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,magenta "pnpm --filter terminal-game-backend start" "pnpm --filter frontend start"
